entries.meaning: Any member of the genus Canna of tropical plants with large leaves and often showy flowers.
examples: A palisade of Canary palms formed an honour guard along the verges, while beds of golden cannas flamed from the central reservation.

description: Borrowed from Italian canna. Doublet of cane.

entries.meaning: (historical) A measure of length in Italy, varying from six to seven feet.
